text: Bernard Bigot (24 January 1950 – 14 May 2022) was a French academic and civil servant. He was the Director-General of the ITER organization from 2015 until his death.New ITER boss promises to strealine management and repair ties with the U.S.. Science Magazine He was the president of the École normale supérieure de Lyon, and director of the French Commission for Atomic Energy.Bernard Bigot, directeur général d'ITER Organization . iter.org Bigot was born in Blois, France. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 2010.
